enable-environment.description: Statically set the menu proxy environment variable (Experimental)
enable-environment.tooltip: Select if you want to set statically the menu proxy environment variable.

enable-jayantana.tooltip: Select if you want to enable the support for JAyatana.

replace-appmenu.description: Use the extension as a replace of Gnome AppMenu (Experimental)
replace-appmenu.tooltip: Select if you want to use the extension as a replace of Gnome AppMenu.

synchronize-panel.description: Allow to synchronize the menus with others in the same panel (Experimental)
synchronize-panel.tooltip: Select if you want to synchronize the menus with others in the same panel.

show-app-icon.description: Show the application icon in the panel
show-app-icon.tooltip: Select if you want to show the application icon in the panel.

desaturate-app-icon.tooltip: Select if you want to desaturate the application icon.

show-app-name.description: Show the application name in the panel
show-app-name.tooltip: Select if you want to show the application name in the panel.

used-window-title.description: Show the window title instead of the application name in the panel
used-window-title.tooltip: Select if you want to show the window title instead of the application name in the panel.

text-gradient.description: Show a linear gradient effect in the application name
text-gradient.tooltip: Select if you want to show a linear gradient effect in the application name.

max-app-name-size.description: Maximum size of the application name:
max-app-name-size.tooltip: Set the maximum size of the application name.

enable-search-provider.description: Enable the HUD Gnome search provider
enable-search-provider.tooltip: Select if you want to enable the HUD Gnome search provider for searching the window menu actions.

hud-overlay-key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the hud menu

num-items.tooltip: The maximum number of items that will be displayed in the HUD menu (more is slower).

global-overlay-key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu

oversize-mode.description: Apply this mode when the panel is oversized:
oversize-mode.tooltip: Select the action to take when the panel menu oversize the available space.

display-in-panel.description: Display the main menu in the panel
display-in-panel.tooltip: Select if you want to display the main menu in the panel.

automatic-active-mainmenu.tooltip: Select if you want to automatically activate the main menu.

activate-on-hover.description: Open the menu when I move my mouse over it
activate-on-hover.tooltip: Enable opening the menu when the mouse enters the applet.

shortcut-modifier.description: Modifier shortcut to open and close the menu of the items

underline-shortcut.tooltip: Allow to underline the selected shortcut characters.

allow-shortcut-colors.description: Allow to set a color for the selected shortcut characters
allow-shortcut-colors.tooltip: Select if you want to allow set a color for the selected shortcut characters.

shortcut-color.tooltip: Set a color to realce the character shortcut

open-active-submenu.tooltip: Select if you want to automatically open the submenu when the mouse is inside of the launcher.

close-active-submenu.tooltip: Select if you want to automatically close the submenu when the mouse is out of the launcher.

show-boxpointer.tooltip: Select if you want to show the boxpointer of all floating menus.

align-menu-launcher.description: Align all menus with his launcher
align-menu-launcher.tooltip: Select if you want to align all menus with his launcher.

effect.tooltip: Select the effect on the menu opening and closing.

effect-time.tooltip: The time on seconds to perform the effect (more time is slower).

show-item-icon.description: Show icons in the menu items
show-item-icon.tooltip: Select if you want to show icons in the menu items.

desaturate-item-icon.description: Desaturate icons in the menu items
desaturate-item-icon.tooltip: Select if you want to desaturate icons in the menu items.
